title: Experienced Virtual Assistant - Customer Service + Dispute Management
job_overview:
Are you service-oriented, proactive, and experienced in customer contact? For our rapidly growing e-commerce business, we are looking for an enthusiastic Virtual Assistant to handle customer service and manage disputes across various payment platforms. Are you someone who can solve problems quickly and efficiently, always keeping the customer’s needs at the forefront? Then we are looking for you!

About the Role
As a Virtual Assistant Customer Service, you will be responsible for responding to customer inquiries via email and managing payments and disputes on platforms such as Paypal, Stripe, Airwallex, and Klarna. You are the key link between our customers and the company, ensuring that questions, complaints, and disputes are handled quickly and correctly. You will work closely with other teaUpgrade to see actual infombers to provide the best possible customer service and enhance customer satisfaction.

What Will You Do?
Respond to customer emails about orders, deliveries, and other inquiries.
Handle disputes and issues through payment platforms like Paypal, Stripe, Airwallex, and Klarna.
Proactively resolve problems to maintain customer satisfaction and prevent refunds or chargebacks.
Stay up-to-date with company information and procedures to assist customers accurately and effectively.
Communicate with other departments to quickly find accurate solutions to customer queries.

What Do You Bring?
Experience in customer service, preferably in the e-commerce sector.
Knowledge of and experience with payment platforms such as Paypal, Stripe, Airwallex, and Klarna is a major plus.
Strong communication skills, both written and verbal, in English.
Problem-solving skills and the ability to work under pressure.
Independence, responsibility, and a keen eye for detail.

What Do We Offer?
A fixed hourly wage with opportunities for growth and bonuses.
Flexible working hours and the ability to work remotely.
A supportive team always ready to assist and share knowledge.
Opportunities for personal development and training to improve your skills.
An environment where your ideas and initiatives are valued.

Are you excited to join our dynamic team and work together to provide an excellent customer experience? Send us code 'VPC30' + your CV and cover letter. We can't wait to hear from you!
